unit_pack_tab.componentleveltooltip: Browse special Grudge Settler units rewarded by the Age of Reckoning, recruitable as mercenaries via the Army panel.

confederation_tab.componentleveltooltip: Confederate other Dwarf Legendary Lords factions by surpassing their attained [[img:icon_grudges]][[/img]]Settled Grudges.

inactive.name: inactive
inactive.tooltip: There are no content-unlocked Lords to confederate

legendary_grudges_tab.componentleveltooltip: Legendary Grudges are important objectives which are completable with the help of any Dwarf factions for unique rewards.

docker_right_timer.componentleveltooltip: Turns until the next Age of Reckoning

callback_with_context.context_function_id: (standard_bundle = PlayersFaction.EffectBundleUnfilteredList.FirstContext(Key.StartsWith("wh3_dlc25_grudge_cycle_") && Key.Contains("dummy") == false && Key != "wh3_dlc25_grudge_cycle_0"), delay_bundle = PlayersFaction.EffectBundleUnfilteredList.FirstContext(Key == "wh3_dlc25_grudge_cycle_0")) => { GetIfElse(IsContextValid(delay_bundle), delay_bundle.TurnsRemaining, standard_bundle.TurnsRemaining) }
